entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Yorkton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:39 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yorkton Airport 06:21 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.5°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -21.2°C
Wind: ESE 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near noon then becoming light this afternoon. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
